duties_responsibilities.duty: Performs Reads & Re-reads orders of residential, commercial and industrial gas meters.
Observes and reports all abnormal, dangerous and/or damaged conditions pertaining to gas meters and adjacent areas.
Training to Perform on Disconnects, Paint meters, complete electronic orders, Atmospheric Corrosion survey & remedial action.
Change index and meter glass Service and Construction Helper.
Performs other related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School /GED Utility, Field Service, or Construction experience preferred, but not required
